md:
giải nghĩa từ "weekdays" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Weekdays** (noun)

* Meaning: Days of the week, excluding Sunday (Monday to Friday)
* Vietnamese: Ngày trong tuần (excluding Sunday)
* Example sentence: "I usually work on weekdays, but I take the weekends off."
* Related words: weekend, Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday.

Note: In some contexts, "weekdays" can also refer to Monday to Saturday, excluding Sunday. However, in general, it is used to refer to the days from Monday to Friday.
